text: (us vakt azaab kee taiyaaree huee) aur jab hamaare bheje hue farishte ibaraaheem ke paas (budhaape mein bete kee) khushakhabaree lekar aae to (ibaraaheem se) bole ham log anaqareeb is gaanv ke rahane vaalon ko halaak karane vaale hain (kyonki) is bastee ke rahane vaale yaqeenee (bade) sarakash hai
